\documentclass[frenchb]{article}
\usepackage[OT1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin1]{inputenc}

\makeatletter
\usepackage{babel}
\makeatother
\begin{document}

\title{Roadmap}

\maketitle

\section{Version 0.2}

\begin{itemize}
\item basic classe for creating metaheuristics
\item a sampling algorithm
\item a pure random search algorithm
\item basic command line interface
\end{itemize}

\section{Version 0.4}

\begin{itemize}
\item basic communication classes, implementing file communication
\item some basic test problems
\item improved command line interface
\end{itemize}

\section{Version 0.6}

\begin{itemize}
\item toolbox for testing : output of basic statistics on the sample (mean,
standard deviation, on position or values)
\end{itemize}

\section{Version 0.8}

\begin{itemize}
\item advanced toolbox for testing : set of R scripts for testing and formatted
output (graphics and \LaTeX report)
\item advanced toolbox for testing : set of R scripts for statistical comparison
of algorithms
\item define complete sets tests problems (i.e. some sets of test functions)
\end{itemize}

\section{Version 0.10}

\begin{itemize}
\item meta-parametring toolbox : output of i/d Pareto fronts
\item basic toolbox for simulating the behavior of algorithms\end{itemize}

\end{document}
